channel.title: Moving home on torvapkz
channel.description: hey, i was cerious on how to move the whole home on torva pkz. like thats everything i need to change and were to find it! please help. il give credits.

item.title: Moving home on torvapkz
item.dc:creator: @austin_cadle austin cadle
item.description:
@austin_cadle wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

Every PI on earth contains home coords in CONFIG.java I will bet 20000$ of my own money that its not in ur server.java

I’m going to convert it to work in server.java so i can have teh money

Read full topic

item.title: Moving home on torvapkz
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

You stupid??? If you want to log into ur home its in config fucking dipshit. Also john stfu nothing is in ur server.java please learn more java before you act smart.

Read full topic

item.title: Moving home on torvapkz
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

[quote=“rhys132, post:9, topic:425403”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=528070.msg3850539#msg3850539 date=1323985505]

Ok, soo your gonna wanna look in server.java and there are some tele coords, there, change various ones till it fits the needs for your setup, “home is there also” than you will want to locate npc_spawn.cfg and change the coords. for the npc’s to where ever you will have your home setup. You will also want to change where you go on death. I think that is located in playerassistant.java.
Goodluck.

Your so wrong it makes my wanna cry.
Ok, soo your gonna wanna look in server.java Config.javaand there are some tele coords, there, change various ones till it fits the needs for your setup, “home is there also” than you will want to locate npc_spawn.cfg spawn-config.cfgand change the coords. for the npc’s to where ever you will have your home setup. You will also want to change where you go on death. I think that is located in playerassistant.java Config.java.
[/quote]

config.java doesnt have tele cords lol, tele cords for home is in clickingbuttons.java, tele using the home button then search them cords and change them to your new home.
config.java contains spawn cords and respawn cords for home, not tele cords[/quote]

Thank you.

Read full topic

You will also want to change where you go on death. I think that is located in playerassistant.java Config.java.[/quote]
